definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
elderly man/father/father-in-law/neck feathers of a bird (old)
(bird species of China) short-tailed albatross (Phoebastria albatrus)
(bird species of China) Laysan albatross (Phoebastria immutabilis)
(bird species of China) black-footed albatross (Phoebastria nigripes)

sentences.english: Albatrosses nesting in the Southern Ocean often undertake circumpolar trips between breeding seasons.
sentences.chinese: 信天翁在南大洋築巢往往繁殖季節之間進行極地考察。

sentences.english: Currently, two male yellow-eyed penguins – an endangered species like the royal albatross – are incubating an egg.
sentences.chinese: 黃眼企鵝同皇家信天翁一樣，處在滅絕的邊緣。

sentences.english: I spent hours watching the albatross in the Galapagos hang out.
sentences.chinese: 我花時間觀察信天翁是在加拉帕戈斯。

sentences.english: There are about 140 royal albatrosses on the colony.
sentences.chinese: 繁殖中心有大約140只皇家信天翁。

sentences.english: Currently, two male yellow-eyed penguins – an endangered species like the royal albatross– are incubating an egg.
sentences.chinese: 黃眼企鵝同皇家信天翁一樣，處在滅絕的邊緣。

sentences.english: A light- mantled sooty albatross looks down on Gold Harbour.
sentences.chinese: 在陽光籠罩下了一隻黑色信天翁俯視着金港。

sentences.english: It ain't all buttons and charts, little albatross.
sentences.chinese: 但是飛行不全是靠按鈕和圖表，小信天翁。

sentences.english: Albatrosses use the wind to help them fly.
sentences.chinese: 信天翁使用風來幫助他們飛。

sentences.english: Then I thought of my friend the albatross, and I smiled for a moment.
sentences.chinese: 然後我想起我的朋友信天翁，笑了片刻。

sentences.english: In late summer even the albatrosses left.
sentences.chinese: 而到了夏末，連信天翁都離開了小島。

definition: (bird species of China) rhinoceros auklet (Cerorhinca monocerata)
vulture/(bird species of China) griffon vulture (Gyps fulvus)
name used for many fishing birds/cormorant/osprey
(bird species of China) mew gull (Larus canus)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
